column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////This place was definitely worth the wait.  It's located right next to the bean in Millennium Park and their breakfast is the big draw.  We had about 10 people in our party and not a single complaint on the food
column3: or portion size.  I had the rancher's skillet with tons of eggs
column6: and mounds of cheddar cheese.  It was fantastic.  Most of the kids had some crazy ass pancakes that looked like dessert.  It was incredible.  Cookie crumbles
column8: chocolate.  Nothing but smiles all around.  It was a wee crowded but I suppose that's the sign of a great place.  We'd definitely go back.
